meanings.definition: An account of imaginary or real people and events told for entertainment.
meanings.sent1: Children love to listen to bedtime stories before going to sleep.
meanings.sent2: The library has a wide selection of stories for all ages.
meanings.sent3: The cat's adventures in the backyard could make a great story!
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a storybook, filled with twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The storyteller painted vivid pictures with her words, bringing the stories to life.

meanings.definition: A level or floor of a building.
meanings.sent1: The apartment building has five stories, each with a different layout.
meanings.sent2: The elevator stopped at every story to pick up passengers.
meanings.sent3: The top story of the house offers a beautiful view of the city.
meanings.sent4: The stories of the skyscraper reached high into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The construction workers added another story to the building, making it taller.

meanings.definition: A report of an item of news in a newspaper, magazine, or broadcast.
meanings.sent1: The journalist wrote a compelling story about the local election.
meanings.sent2: The breaking news story interrupted the regular program on TV.
meanings.sent3: The gossip column always has an interesting story to share.
meanings.sent4: The story in the newspaper shed light on the community's concerns.
meanings.sent5: The radio host shared a heartwarming story to uplift the listeners' spirits.
